feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-12-14T15:54:54.080002Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;巴塞罗那超级计算中心推出 Sargantana：新型开源 RISC-V 芯片</stitle>; <id>;https://www.bsc.es/news/bsc-news/bsc-呈现-sargantana-the-new- Generation-the-first-open-source-chips-Designed-spain</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T12:54:39.825350Z</更新>; <link href="https ://www.bsc.es/news/bsc-news/bsc-presents-sargantana-the-new- Generation-the-first-open-source-chips-Designed-spain"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pimterry </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pimterry</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.bsc .es/sites/default/files/public/styles/bscw2_-_simple_crop_style_-_news_image/public/bscw2/content/news/square-image/sargantana_11.jpg?itok=DKNIs-rL&sc=8ded24c614fe4ad2d2667fa3c971d33c" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;巴塞罗那超级计算中心（BSC）推出了全新的 Sargantana 芯片，这是完全由 BSC 设计的第三代开源处理器。该芯片基于 RISC-V 开放硬件技术，是巩固 BSC 在欧洲 RISC-V 开源计算技术研究领先地位的关键一步。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#barcelona-supercomputing-center-presents-sargantana-new -open-source-risc-v-chip" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38640406" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;可视化格斗游戏机制(2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://janezhang.ca/work/tekken/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T13:54:39.827446Z</更新>; <link href="https: //janezhang.ca/work/tekken/"/>; <author>; <name>;skadamat</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=skadamat</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://janezhang.ca/work/tekken/images/Tk-cards.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;这个项目旨在创建一个视觉辅助工具，帮助玩家学习如何思考游戏，而不仅仅是如何玩游戏。通过将游戏机制分解为更小的组件，我设计了卡片作为一个小倍数，允许玩家对战斗动作进行比较，以更好地理解它们。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#visualizing-fighting-game-mechanics-2020" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38641105" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;通过个人阅读器回收网络</stitle>; <id>;https://olano .dev/2023-12-12-reclaiming-the-web-with-a-personal-reader/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T11:54:39.827849Z</更新>; <link href="https ://olano.dev/2023-12-12-reclaiming-the-web-with-a-personal-reader/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;stanislavb</名称>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=stanislavb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://olano.dev/assets/img/feedi1.png" style="width ：220像素； height: 161px;" />;<br />;去年，作者经历了职业倦怠和对软件行业的幻灭。为了重新体验软件开发的乐趣并重新掌控自己所消费的信息，作者建立了自己的自己的个人提要阅读器，名为 feedi。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#reclaiming-the-web-with-a-personal-reader" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38622404" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;新的本地数据堆栈：集成 Dagster、dbt 和 DuckDB</stitle>; <id>;https://georgheiler.com/2023 /12/11/dagster-dbt-duckdb-as-new-local-mds/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T09:54:39.828661Z</更新>; <link href="https://georgheiler .com/2023/12/11/dagster-dbt-duckdb-as-new-local-mds/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;geoHeil</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=geoHeil</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://georgheiler.com/2023/12/11/dagster-dbt-duckdb-as-new- local-mds/featured_hu932710057e43173cbf2b2b0843260cb7_1660828_720x2500_fit_q75_h2_lanczos.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;在当今快节奏的数据环境中，精简而强大的数据堆栈对于任何组织的基础架构都至关重要。本文探讨了利用 DuckDB、Dagster 和 dbt（这三个关键工具）的集成设置。现代数据工程。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-new-local-data-stack-integrating-dagster-dbt-and-duckdb" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38610892" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科幻界面：黑客</stitle>; <id>;https://scifiinterfaces.com/2023/12/ 11/hackers/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T06:54:39.829036Z</更新>; <link href="https://scifiinterfaces.com/2023/12/11/hackers/"/>; <作者>; <name>;rx_tx</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rx_tx</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://i0.wp.com/scifiinterfaces.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/Hackers_3D_browsing_0400-1.png?resize=545%2C241&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 98px;" />;<br />;《黑客》讲述了一群青少年计算机黑客闯入一家知名公司的计算机系统并发现了该公司计算机安全主管创建的蠕虫程序的故事。他们必须重新闯入该系统下载完整的蠕虫程序并揭露真正的罪魁祸首。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sci-fi-interfaces-hackers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38638421" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ledger 的 NPM 帐户已被黑客入侵</stitle>; height: 261px;" />;<br />;https://www.npmjs.com/package/@ledgerhq/connect-kit?activeTab=versions 1.1.7 是最近的更新，源代码可疑。https://cdn .jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1：https://twitter.com/bantg/status/1735279127752540465 来源... <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ledger -s-npm-account-has-been-hacked" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38641211" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;经验教训构建 GitHub 代码搜索 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CqZA_KmygKw</id>; <updated>;2023-12-14T04:54:39.830174Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CqZA_KmygKw"/>; <作者>; <名称>;costco</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =costco</uri>; </author>; <content type =“html”>; <iframe src =“//www.youtube.com/embed/CqZA_KmygKw”frameborder =“0”allowfullscreen loading =“lazy”>;</ iframe >; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lessons-from-building-github-code-search-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38637652" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat .io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;发现世界上最古老的堡垒</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-12-oldest-fortresses-world.html </id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T06:54:39.830546Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-12-oldest-fortresses-world.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/oldest-fortresses-in-t.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：146px;" />;<br />;在一项突破性的考古发现中，在西伯利亚发现了坚固的史前定居点，挑战了只有农业出现后人们才开始建造永久定居点的观念。这些定居点共建造了 8,000 个几年前，揭示西伯利亚的狩猎采集者在他们的定居点周围拥有复杂的防御结构。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#oldest-fortresses-in-the-world-discovered" target="_blank ">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38619629" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;黑客发现，火车被设计成在第三方维修后就会发生故障</stitle>; < id>;https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/12/manufacturer-deliberately-bricked-trains-repaired-by-competitors-hackers-find/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T07:54 ：39.830903Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/tech-policy/2023/12/manufacturer-deliberately-bricked-trains-repaired-by-competitors-hackers-find/"/>; <作者>; <name>;Stratscope</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Stratscope</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/12/Newag-YouTube-800x437.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：121px;" />;<br />;黑客发现波兰的火车在设计上会在第三方维修后发生故障，从而导致铁路旅行中断。道德黑客组织 Dragon Sector 发现火车制造商 Newag将代码插入到 Impuls 列车的控制系统中，以防止它们在独立维修店维修时运行。Newag 否认这些指控，并威胁要起诉 Dragon Sector。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#trains- were-Design-to-break-down-after-third-party-repairs-hackers-find" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=38638865" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;大金刚：奋斗记录</stitle>; <id>;https://shmuplations.com/donkeykong/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T03:54:39.831586Z</已更新>; <link href="https://shmuplations.com/donkeykong/"/>; <作者>; <name>;msephton</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=msephton< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://shmuplations.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/11/dk00.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 136px;" />;<br />;从1996年12月到1997年4月，《bit》杂志发表了一系列题为《街机游戏技术》的文章，作者是池上通信机程序员小野目宏久。最后一篇文章是一篇深入的文章检查原始大金刚街机游戏的制作。从设计问题到马里奥背后的实际数学函数<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#donkey-kong-a-record-of-struggle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38608521" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;概念滑块：用于扩散模型中精确控制的 LoRA 适配器</stitle>; <id>;https://sliders.baulab.info/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T01:54:39.831951Z</更新>; <link href="https://sliders.baulab.info/" />; <author>; <name>;billconan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=billconan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://sliders.baulab.info/images/paper/directions.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 111px;" />;<br />;在图像生成和编辑过程中精确调制语义概念的能力为利用文本到图像扩散模型的艺术家开启了创意表达的新领域。我们的概念滑块可以对视觉效果进行细致入微的连续编辑通过识别与特定概念相关的可解释的潜在方向来识别属性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#concept-sliders-lora-adaptors-for-precise-control-in-diffusion-models" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38615521" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;现代黑色素瘤疫苗将死亡率降低一半</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/benefits-moderna-merck-melanoma-vaccine-plus-keytruda-extend-third-years-2023-12-14/</id>; <更新>;2023-12- 14T15:19:39.832303Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/benefits-moderna-merck-melanoma-vaccine-plus-keytruda-extend-third-years -2023-12-14/"/>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38642273" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Ledger 钱包的 LedgerHQ/connect-kit 受到供应链攻击</stitle>; <id>;https ://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/12/14/defi-protocol-sushis-cto-warns-of-possible-exploit/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T13:54:39.832664Z </更新>; <link href="https://www.coindesk.com/business/2023/12/14/defi-protocol-sushis-cto-warns-of-possible-exploit/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;raghavsood</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=raghavsood</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// www.coindesk.com/resizer/IrsuO-stylOsrNQg3mXFZ29NRpE=/567x319/filters:quality(80):format(jpg)/cloudfront-us-east-1.images.arcpublishing.com/coindesk/JJ3EOKRGSBCC7CGUQKI4MKYMJA.jpg" style="宽度：220px； height: 124px;" />;<br />;Sushi 首席技术官警告称，由于去中心化金融 (DeFi) 协议受到前端漏洞攻击，因此存在与 Ledger Connect Kit 相关的全行业漏洞。该漏洞涉及黑客更改用于将资金转移给自己的网站或应用程序的用户界面 (UI)。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ledger-wallet-s-ledgerhq-connect-kit-hit-by-supply-连锁攻击" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38640999" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;曾经有一个帝国</stitle>; <id >;https://novum.substack.com/p/there-once-was-an-empire</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T07:54:39.833017Z</更新>; <link href="https: //novum.substack.com/p/there-once-was-an-empire"/>; <author>; <name>;apollinaire</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= apollinaire</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_1456,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https% 3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F624432de-0fe5-45c9-813b-7e2cb5723da2_716x297.jpeg" style="width: 220px; height: 92px;" />;<br />;文章讨论了历史书写中的“兴衰”概念以及对衰落和崩溃的迷恋。以苏联的崩溃为例进行探讨，重点关注崩溃这篇文章强调了在应对帝国丧失的经历中形成的独特文学传统及其对奥地利作家的影响<a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#there-once-was-an-empire" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38617036" target=" _blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;QEMU- iOS，旧版 Apple 设备的模拟器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/devos50/qemu-ios</id>; <updated>;2023-12-14T06:54:39.833366Z</updated>; < link href="https://github.com/devos50/qemu-ios"/>; <author>; <name>;stormed</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=stormed< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/45c55738f3661c6e5f0f983e070fa977c01bddc43701a1ccb22056ad0c0ba15a/devos50/qemu-ios" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;适用于旧版 Apple 设备的 QEMU 模拟器。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户来为 devos50/qemu-ios 开发做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/# qemu-ios-an-emulator-for-legacy-apple-devices" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38638452" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text" >;Ledger 库已确认遭到破坏并被 Drainer 替换</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter.com/bantg/status/1735279127752540465</id>; <updated>;2023-12-14T13:54:39.833722Z</updated >; <link href="https://twitter.com/bantg/status/1735279127752540465"/>; <作者>; <name>;wslh</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= wslh</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但不要担心 - 让我们再试一次。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ledger -library-confirmed-compromished-and-replaced-with-a-drainer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38640995 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;多个微处理器作为单个 CPU（不是多处理）</stitle>; <id>;https://forum.vcfed.org/index.php?threads/multiple-microprocessors-as-a-single-cpu-not-multiprocessing .1245942/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T10:54:39.834115Z</更新>; <link href="https://forum.vcfed.org/index.php?threads/multiple-microprocessors-as -a-single-cpu-not-multiprocessing.1245942/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;JPLeRouzic</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JPLeRouzic</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;有使用多个微处理器来实现虚拟内存并向常规 CPU 添加寄存器的示例。其他示例包括扩展内存地址范围和扩展 CPU 中的字。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#multiple-microprocessors-as-a-single-cpu-not-multiprocessing" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38639621" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Deno 1.39：WebGPU 的回归</stitle>; <id>;https://deno.com/blog/v1.39</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T10:54:39.834489Z</updated>; <link href="https://deno.com/blog/v1.39"/>; <author>; <name>;oritsnile</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=oritsnile</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/13602871? v=4" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;Deno 1.39 标志着 Deno 生态系统的一次重大更新，其中备受期待的 WebGPU 回归，增强了图形、游戏和机器学习的能力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#deno-1-39-the-return-of-webgpu" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38639698" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;警方破坏了随身摄像头的承诺</stitle>; <id>;https://www.propublica.org/article/how-police-undermined-promise- body-cameras</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T13:54:39.834845Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.propublica.org/article/how-police-undermined-promise-body -cameras"/>; <author>; <name>;panic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=panic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://img.assets-d.propublica.org/v5/images/NailaRuechel_TheRichards004-copy.jpg?crop=focalpoint&fit=crop&fm=webp&fp-x=0.5&fp-y=0.5&h=874&q=75&w =800&s=4b4cde2240ffecdd0721b95d332236c4" style="宽度：220px；高度：241px；" />;<br />;警察部门花费了数亿纳税人的钱购买随身摄像机，但他们经常拒绝公布镜头，即使是在涉及警官的杀戮案件中。警察部门对录像的控制破坏了透明度和问责制的承诺。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#police-have-undermined-the-promise-of-body-cameras" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38641198" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;您应该在文档中添加屏幕截图吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://thisisimportant.net/posts/screenshots-in-documentation/</id >; <更新>;2023-12-14T10:54:39.835199Z</更新>; <link href="https://thisisimportant.net/posts/screenshots-in-documentation/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;todsacerdoti< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;文档中的屏幕截图可能是一个有争议的话题 - 有些人真的很喜欢他们认为它们增加了很多价值，而其他人则由于维护负担和可访问性问题而不喜欢它们。作为一名技术作家，我会尽可能避免在文档中添加屏幕截图。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#should-you-add-screenshots-to-documentation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38639629" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;询问 HN：构建 AI/ML 技能的日常实践？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38638373</id >; <更新>;2023-12-14T06:54:39.835564Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38638373"/>; <作者>; <名称>;atomicnature</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=atomicnature</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;如果您每天有大约 1 小时的时间用于开发 AI/ML 技能，重点落实论文和解决问题。找到一种方法将人工智能/机器学习变成你的全职工作或学校。考虑回到学校以获得更快、更具体的结果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-daily-practices-for-building-ai-ml-skills" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38638373" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用山图让 OKR 更有趣</stitle>; <id>;https://martin.sh/engaging-okr-checkins-with-hill -charts/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T02:54:39.835922Z</更新>; <link href="https://martin.sh/engaging-okr-checkins-with-hill-charts/" />; <author>; <name>;showmypost</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=showmypost</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://martin.sh/content/images/size/w1200/2023/02/okrs-on-hill-charts.png" style="宽度：220px；高度：102px；" />;<br />;OKR（目标和关键结果）是许多公司用来调整和衡量特定目标进展情况的目标设定框架。 OKR 虽然有效，但由于严格关注指标和不断衡量进度，可能会变得枯燥和令人沮丧。山图提供了更现实的进度视图，并帮助团队了解他们如何朝着目标前进。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#making-okrs-more-playful-using-hill-charts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38617346" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;个性化 Emacs 文档导航</stitle>; <id>;http://yummymelon.com/devnull/personalizing-emacs-doc-navigation.html</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T05:54:39.836282Z</更新>; <link href="http://yummymelon.com/devnull/personalizing-emacs-doc-navigation.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;kickingvegas </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kickingvegas</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="http://yummymelon.com /devnull/images/opengraph-default.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：116px；" />;<br />;我对 Emacs 提供的文档模式一直有着复杂的感受。虽然我很欣赏它们的存在，但我发现它们的默认键绑定很神秘且不一致。因此，我经常转向网络寻求帮助。不过，我找到了一种通过修改 UX 使阅读 Emacs 文档更加自然的方法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#personalizing-emacs-doc-navigation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=38621838" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;建设性辩论初学者指南（2020）</stitle>; <id>;https://liamrosen.com/arguments.html</id>; <更新>;2023-12-14T01:54： 39.836993Z</updated>; <link href="https://liamrosen.com/arguments.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://liamrosen.com/Pyramid%20of%20Argumentative%20Experience.svg" style="width: 220px;高度：124px；” />;<br />;地球上绝大多数人都以破坏性的方式争论。辩论，尤其是在网络空间中的辩论，被视为一场斗智斗勇的斗争，在这场斗智斗勇中，自我展示得淋漓尽致，而且只能有一个“赢家”。相反，我们应该以建设性的方式进行争论：将争论视为扩展知识的机会，找到分歧点，并<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#beginner-s-guide-to- arguing-constructively-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38636609" target="_blank">;[评论]< /a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Proton Mail 获得用于加密电子邮件的桌面应用程序和日历</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/14/24000696/proton-mail-desktop-app-mac-windows-encrypted</id>; <更新>;2023-12 -14T13：54：39.837343Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.theverge.com/2023/12/14/24000696/proton-mail-desktop-app-mac-windows-encrypted”/>; <作者>; <名称>;cendenta </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=cendenta</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“ https://duet-cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/0x0:2050x1022/2400x1600/filters:focal(1025x511:1026x512):format(webp)/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/ 25161642/Screen_Shot_2023_12_13_at_2.03.43_PM.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;适用于 Windows 和 macOS 的桌面应用程序现已推出测试版，供特定用户组使用，并将包括离线使用和加密电子邮件转发功能。Proton Mail 终于获得了用于加密电子邮件的桌面应用程序和日历。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#proton-mail-gets-a-desktop-app-for-encrypted-email-and-calendar" target="_blank">;[摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38641048" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SMERF：可流式内存高效辐射场</stitle>; <id>;https://smerf-3d.github。 io/</id>; <更新>;2023-12-13T19:54:39.837694Z</更新>; <link href="https://smerf-3d.github.io/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;duckworthd </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=duckworthd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://smerf-3d .github.io/assets/img/merf/social.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;SMERF 是一种视图合成方法，可在大型场景的实时方法中实现最先进的精度。它可在 Web 中实现完整的六自由度 (6DOF) 导航浏览器并在商用智能手机和笔记本电脑上实时渲染。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#smerf-streamable-memory-efficient-radiance-fields" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=38632492" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
